pr_title: Removing rawtypes warnings by suppression - Iteration 1

timeline.message: Removing some of the rawtypes warning

timeline.author: saugup-ms
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -136,7 +136,7 @@
      * @throws ClientException
      * @throws IOException
      */
-    public static boolean tryFociTokenWithGivenClientId(@NonNull final BrokerOAuth2TokenCache brokerOAuth2TokenCache,
+    public static boolean tryFociTokenWithGivenClientId(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") @NonNull final BrokerOAuth2TokenCache brokerOAuth2TokenCache,
                                                         @NonNull final String clientId,

replies.bodyText: I have taken care of this. Thanks
replies.author: neeravagarwalmicrosoft

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/common/src/main/java/com/microsoft/identity/common/internal/migration/TokenCacheItemMigrationAdapter.java b/common/src/main/java/com/microsoft/identity/common/internal/migration/TokenCacheItemMigrationAdapter.java
index 82a14b546..eab6d0fcc 100644
--- a/common/src/main/java/com/microsoft/identity/common/internal/migration/TokenCacheItemMigrationAdapter.java
+++ b/common/src/main/java/com/microsoft/identity/common/internal/migration/TokenCacheItemMigrationAdapter.java

@@ -136,7 +137,7 @@ public class TokenCacheItemMigrationAdapter {
      * @throws ClientException
      * @throws IOException
      */
-    public static boolean tryFociTokenWithGivenClientId(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") @NonNull final BrokerOAuth2TokenCache brokerOAuth2TokenCache,
+    public static boolean tryFociTokenWithGivenClientId(@SuppressWarnings(WarningType.rawtype_warning) @NonNull final BrokerOAuth2TokenCache brokerOAuth2TokenCache,
                                                         @NonNull final String clientId,
                                                         @NonNull final String redirectUri,
                                                         @NonNull final ICacheRecord cacheRecord) throws IOException, ClientException {

timeline.bodyText: I like the use of the constant; however can we use this everywhere?
timeline.author: shoatman

replies.bodyText: Sure @shoatman , I have now used the constant everywhere. Thanks.
replies.author: neeravagarwalmicrosoft
